data.text: Esiawoe nye David ƒe viŋutsu siwo wodzi nɛ le Hebron:
Via ŋutsu etɔ̃liae nye Absalom, ame si Maaka, Gesur Fia, Talmai ƒe vinyɔnu dzi nɛ.
Via atɔ̃liae nye Sefatia eye dadae nye Abital
Wodzi ŋutsu ade siawo na Fia David le Hebron, afi si wòɖu fia le ƒe adre kple afã.
Esi David nɔ Yerusalem la, srɔ̃a Batseba, Amiel ƒe vinyɔnu dzi vi ene siwoe nye:
Vi asieke bubuwo ganɔ David si; woawoe nye: Ibhar, Elisama, Elifelet,
Noga, Nefeg, Yafia,
Elisama, Eliada kple Elifelet.
Vi siwo nyɔnu bubuwo dzi nɛ la mele ame siawo dome o. Vinyɔnu aɖe hã nɔ David si; eŋkɔe nye Tamar.
Fia Solomo ƒe dzidzimeviwoe nye Rehoboam,
Yoram alo Yehoram,
Amazia,
Ahaz,
Amon kple Yosia.
Yosia ƒe viwoe nye,
Ame siwo ɖu fia ɖe
Yehoyatsin, ame si wolé la ƒe dzidzimeviwoe nye,
Malkiram, Pedaya, Senazar, Yekamia, Hosama kple Nedadia.
Pedaya ƒe viŋutsuwoe nye,
Via ŋutsu atɔ̃ bubuwoe nye Hasuba, Ohel, Berekia, Hasadia kple Yusab Hesed.
Hananiya ƒe dzidzimeviwoe nye,
Sekania ƒe dzidzimeviwoe nye,
Viŋutsu etɔ̃ nɔ Nearia si; woawoe nye,
Vi adre nɔ Elioenai si: Woawoe nye Hodavia, Eliasib, Pelaya, Akub, Yohanan, Delaya kple Anani.
